headline: Refrigeration Equipment Global Market Report 2024-2025 & 2030: Carrier Global, Johnson Controls, Trane Technologies, Daikin Industries, Ingersoll Rand Lead with 25.2% Revenue Share
summary: The refrigeration equipment market opportunities lie in adopting IoT, AI, and cloud for smart systems, focusing on energy efficiency and compliance with environmental regulations. Companies should emphasize sustainable designs, digital capabilities, and strategic alliances to meet evolving demands driven by climate change, urbanization, and health concerns.Dublin, Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Refrigeration Equipment Market, Global, 2025-2030" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets
